channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: There’s one ‘tremendous’ mistake people make while negotiating, top negotiator says
item.description: The "egocentric bias" is at the heart of it.

item.description: AI and carbon emissions are driving a change of heart.

item.description: Louisiana, Hawaii and Washington begin early voting on Friday, joining the vast majority of U.S. states in kicking off the 2024 election.

item.title: Detroit Accused Of Deleting Ballot Drop Box Surveillance Footage After Republicans Asked To See It

item.title: The next wave of AI won’t be driven by LLMs. Here’s what investors should focus on instead
item.description: The diminishing returns from each new iteration of LLMs are making it clear that we’re nearing the top of the S-curve for this particular technology.

item.description: An international environment conducive to American freedom and prosperity requires forward-deployed conventional forces on European soil.
